meanings: being in school, ―하다 be in school[college], attend school[college]
proof of enrollment, certificate of registration
get a copy of one's proof of enrollment
excel in both ability and learning

vlive.korean: 재학생들이래. We've been registered as students. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids: 제 9구역 시즌3 (The 9th Season 3)] EP.01

vlive.korean: [전소현 학교 지금 재학 중이세요?] Are you currently attending school? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [예쁨전공] 백석대학교 VS 강릉원주대학교 3-2회
나도 지금 그 생각 했어 - 재학 중이시죠? I thought the same. - You're in college, right? 듣기 View video TWICE : [FULL] TWICE SHOWCASE
vlive.english: I thought the same. - You're in college, right?

vlive.korean: [과제 미뤄두고 나온 재학생] 네, 지금 과제있어요. Yes, I have an assignment I need to work on. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [예쁨전공] 백석대학교 VS 강릉원주대학교 3-2회
vlive.english: Yes, I have an assignment I need to work on.

examples.korean: I just finished university this year, majoring in economics. While I was in school, I had the chance to work as a part-timer in a trading corporation for two years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경제학 전공으로 올해 막 졸업했는데 재학 중 무역회사에서 2년간 아르바이트를 할 기회가 있었습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I just finished university this year, majoring in economics. While I was in school, I had the chance to work as a part-timer in a trading corporation for two years. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: For instance, during my senior years as an engineering student at Yonsei University, I developed an energy-to-waste project that is designed to effectively manage disposal waste and convert it to bio-energy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 예를 들어 제가 연세대에서 공학도로 재학 중이던 4학년 때, 폐기물을 이용하여 바이오 에너지로 전환하는 프로젝트를 개발한 적이 있습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: For instance, during my senior years as an engineering student at Yonsei University, I developed an energy-to-waste project that is designed to effectively manage disposal waste and convert it to bio-energy. Add to Wordbook
